description: MULTIPLAYER is now live! Join battles for control over hyperspace with up to 5 players at the same time and track your progress using online leaderboards ==== We recommend using 3G or WiFi connection for better multiplayer experience =====  Solves the issue with overheating Pre's and includes even more bugfixes!  ===== A new twist on the classic gameplay, go beyond playing in just four directions. Enter the dangerous deep space with your brand new hyperdrive equipped mining ship and start collecting asteroids. Use intuitive touch controls to steer the ship clear of your engine's contrail. But beware! You are not alone out there. Beautiful rendering of space and awesome effects use full graphics potential of Pre and PDK.
